snippet.title: Oculus Quest 2 / Pro . Escape from Bunker - VR Game with REALMOVEMENT technology .Trailer 2022
snippet.description:
Buy on Oculus App
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5458048390976704/
https://escapefrombunker.com/

My project I've been working on for over a year!
The game is based on 6dof technology, which allows you to use real space and synchronize it with gameplay for a full immersion in the Virtual World.
This game was created on the Unreal Engine in conjunction with the new AI-assisted texture generation capabilities. Thanks to this, even on such platforms oculus quest, it was able to achieve realistic graphics.
A little bit about the game:

  A near future in which mankind is threatened by a falling meteorite! And to save mankind everyone is placed in bunkers, which are controlled by artificial intelligence! Something went wrong, and even after the danger has passed, the computer still decides that you have to stay locked up here forever...
   - Unique gameplay with moving in real space, giving us an even deeper dive into the virtual world!
  - Well-optimized graphics that allow you to enjoy a realistic picture without using a powerful PC
  - Intuitive gameplay will allow anyone to enjoy this game, even someone who has never played a similar game before!
